TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpApplicationState extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpApplicationState Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 允许共享 ASP.NET 应用程序内多个会话和请求之间的全局信息。

span.span: Enables sharing of global information across multiple sessions and requests within an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 应用程序是虚拟目录范围内的所有文件、页面、处理程序、模块和代码以及单个 Web 服务器上的子目录的总和。An ASP.NET application is the sum of all files, pages, handlers, modules, and code within the scope of a virtual directory and its subdirectories on a single Web server. 当 客户端第一次请求特定 ASP.NET 应用程序虚拟目录内的任何 URL 资源时，将创建类的单个实例。A single instance of an class is created the first time a client requests any URL resource from within a particular ASP.NET application virtual directory. 为 Web 服务器上的每个 ASP.NET 应用程序创建一个单独的实例。A separate single instance is created for each ASP.NET application on a Web server. 然后，将通过内部对象公开对每个实例的引用 。A reference to each instance is then exposed via the intrinsic object. 应用程序状态不会在 Web 场之间共享 (其中，应用程序托管在多个服务器上) 或 Web 园 (，其中应用程序托管在同一台计算机上的多个进程中) 。Application state is not shared across either a Web farm (in which an application is hosted across multiple servers) or a Web garden (in which an application is hosted across multiple processes on the same computer).

span.span: This type is thread safe.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Lock() cil managed

summary.span: 锁定对 变量的访问以促进访问同步。

span.span: Locks access to an variable to facilitate access synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通过 和 属性以及、、、、 和 方法执行自动锁定和解锁。The class performs automatic locking and unlocking with the and properties and the , , , , , and methods. 但是， 如果有一系列操作，则显式使用和方法可能更高效。However, explicitly using the and methods when you have a series of operations may be more efficient. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法和 方法，阻止其他会话更改两个应用程序变量的值，直到本地会话更改它们为止。The following example uses the method and method to prevent other sessions from changing the value of two application variables until after the local session has changed them. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpApplicationState.Lock Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取由 标记声明的所有对象，其中范围设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序中的“Application”。

span.span: Gets all objects declared by an tag where the scope is set to "Application" within the ASP.NET application.
A collection of objects on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序对象是在标记内的 global.asax 文件中定义的 `` 。Application objects are defined in the Global.asax file inside the `` tags. ## Examples 下面的示例将所有应用程序对象获取到 变量中，仅当对象数大于0时才执行例程。The following example gets all application objects into a variable and executes a routine only if the number of objects is greater than 0.
